description: This PHP source file serves as a web page for voice diagnostics debug configuration, specifically for service provider SIP logging and gain adjustments. It includes PHP logic to retrieve current configuration values, HTML for form layout, JavaScript for dynamic interactions and AJAX calls to update settings, and includes external PHP files for headers and utilities.

methods.name: Dm_data_get
methods.description: Retrieves current SIP logging server IP address, port, gain levels, and voice process status from device configuration.
